form.label: API Manager and Analytics Metrics - Production

search.query: index=$platformMetricsIndex$ | stats values(businessGroup) as bg by businessGroup

index=$platformMetricsIndex$ | eventstats max(_time) as maxTimestamp | where _time=maxTimestamp | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | stats values(apiManagerMetrics.apis.production.transactions) as total | stats sum(total) as "API Requests"

panel.title: API Analytics - Transactions/Requests - Last 30 days - Timeline

chart.title: API Analytics - Transactions/Requests - Last 30 days - Timeline

search.query: index=$platformMetricsIndex$ | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) apiManagerMetrics.apis.production.transactions > 0 | chart values(apiManagerMetrics.apis.production.transactions) as "API Requests" by _time, businessGroup
